column2: Term referring to a service with little downtime over an extended period of time. A low downtime/time
Ability to have an interruption (fault) in your service without the application going offline
The delivery of computing services over the Internet offering Infrastructure ()VMs, storange, DBs, networking), Platform, and Software as services.
Information and data, Devices (Mobile and PCs), Accounts and identites
Identity and directory infrastructure, Applications, Network controls, Operating system
Physical hosts, Physical network, Physical datacenter
Refers to the spending of money on phyisical infrastructure before operations begin, deducting said expense from taxes over time.
